title: [BUG] wrong german translation for scheduled workflow
excerpt: ### Description The description for the offset says, contrary to the english documentation, that negative offsets will cause to trigger after the date where positive offsets will trigger earlier. ### Steps to reproduce Create new workflow with scheduled trigger on the german edition. ### Webserver logs ```bash Not necessary, UI isssue ``` ### Browser logs ```bash ``` ### Paperless-ngx version 2.18
